quoteText: This is a case-by-case determination that depends on things like the nature of the data, why it is collected and processed, and relevant legal or operational retention needs.
title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "We store data until it is no longer necessary to provide our services and Facebook Products, or until your account is deleted - whichever comes first. This is a case-by-case determination that depends on things like the nature of the data, why it is collected and processed, and relevant legal or operational retention needs."
